title: Yasuo Max Q or E
body:
My 2 friends have argued on Yasuo what to max, One says you max E because after the Q nerfs (6/5/4/3/2 CD/L) > (4/4/4/4/4 CD/L). The other one says Q is still better though.

Edit: Strawpoll
http://strawpoll.me/3921111

replies.body: Im sorry is e ever a viable option to max??

> [{quoted}](name=Dawaraven,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-20T22:03:55.914+0000)
>
> Im sorry is e ever a viable option to max??

y you move to na bb

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-03-20T22:23:36.216+0000)
>
> y you move to na bb

I am not move, my NA and OCE acc have the same login so I cant logjn to OCE acc kek.

Also everyone saying max e, are you trolling, pre 30, or have I missed something in the patch notes?

> [{quoted}](name=Dawaraven,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-03-24T02:40:50.594+0000)
>
> I am not move, my NA and OCE acc have the same login so I cant logjn to OCE acc kek.
> 
> Also everyone saying max e, are you trolling, pre 30, or have I missed something in the patch notes?

Q is now (4/4/4/4/4 CD/L) Instead of the previous (6/5/4/3/2 CD/L).

> [{quoted}](name=GhostlyHell,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-24T04:45:48.452+0000)
>
> Q is now (4/4/4/4/4 CD/L) Instead of the previous (6/5/4/3/2 CD/L).

The cooldown and cast time of Steel Tempest is reduced by 1% for every 1.72% of Yasuo's bonus attack speed.

> [{quoted}](name=Dawaraven,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-25T08:44:53.373+0000)
>
> The cooldown and cast time of Steel Tempest is reduced by 1% for every 1.72% of Yasuo's bonus attack speed.

I know that, I'm just commenting the base CD/L.

Depends really.

But in most cases, E.

The benefit of maxing E is far greater than maxing Q since Q is now on a 4 second cool down anyway.

Per Level:
Q - 20 base damage. That's it.
E - Much faster dashing, 30 base damage per level, ability to cast E again very quickly.

So theres more benefit maxing E since Q damage gets spiked by building crit anyway whereas you can't increase the damage on Q that much by levelling it up and buying crit as opposed to the mixed damage (since E deals magic) that E can bring along with good damage from critting Qs anyway.

THIS!!
Q scales off items. Very little off levels.
E scales very well off levels, and not at all from relevant items... (triforce users leave pls :D )
So comparatively, levelling e is gonna help you out the most early game. And by the time you progress to mid-late game and your Qs are scaling well from attack speed, you probably have q maxed as well (level 13).
I start q but max e

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-07-02T20:44:45.491+0000)
>
> I start q but max e

nice necro

> [{quoted}](name=Garens Harem,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-07-03T13:02:44.101+0000)
>
> nice necro

thankyou

Max Q in the Jungle and E in lane (That's what the pro's on lolpro.com recommend) (Their guides are awesome)(Their skill levelling for lane is E maxed and their skill levelling for jungle is Q maxed). Always trust lolpro. Always. Haha. Every good Yasuo I've vs'd in lane has maxed E before Q and maxed Q as jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HpxhV77a,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-03-24T18:40:53.892+0000)
>
> Max Q in the Jungle and E in lane (That's what the pro's on lolpro.com recommend) (Their guides are awesome)(Their skill levelling for lane is E maxed and their skill levelling for jungle is Q maxed). Always trust lolpro. Always. Haha. Every good Yasuo I've vs'd in lane has maxed E before Q and maxed Q as jungle.

No "good" yasuo jungles.
http://www.lolpro.com/guides/yasuo#418486

go look on lolpro, every one used q max.

Qtpie maxed E 1 game, Q in 2 - ask him why.

I'd personally max E in mid lane and Q in the jungle and yeah I think Yasuo is a good jungler and I also think this isn't set in stone, because it depends on playstyle.

Much like Zed can dish out more DPS if he is pro by maxing E over Q but most Zeds choose to take Q because it is safer and easier to poke at range than take risks - just like taking Q on Yasuo is safer but if you are willing to put in the effort you can dish out more dps with E.

It gives him high mobility. Maxing it reduces the time it takes before you can E someone again so it's good for chases. Q is just generally safer much like with Zed.

Every champ can vary, pointing out a few games and saying "hah" you're wrong is silly, it's a guide - not the rules, I just agree with the choice and from experience the better Yasuo's I've vs'd have maxed E in lane and Q in the jungle.

I vary my skill levelling depending on heaps of factors so if you want to learn more about Yasuo I recommend reading the guide on lolpro and maybe some of the strategies and even recommend watching the Champion spotlight as I don't think you'll get a simple yes or no answer on this, but you will get a recommendation for if you are uneducated - on what to do (Ie which skills to level).

His e has no "dps". It cant be used on a single target more than once every 10-6 or so seconds. The q cooldown goes down to about 1.3 once you have 1.4 attack speed. It actually scales with crit/AD, and is AOE.

Zeds q has a higher base, scaling, and can hit the target twice, dealing 50% dmg the 2nd time.

Zeds e has 2 seconds less cooldown than his q, less base, scaling, and if it hits a target twice it does NO ADDITIONAL DAMAGE.

Yasuo can be jungled, but it is kinda bad. I used to jungle jayce and talon, and was excited to jungle yasuo when he was released but it was kinda underwhelming, even on the old jungle.

While I am completely open to new ideas, like e max yasuo, q max is simply better, and the OP was asking for which was better.

"My 2 friends have argued on Yasuo what to max, One says you max E because after the Q nerfs (6/5/4/3/2 CD/L) > (4/4/4/4/4 CD/L). The other one says Q is still better though."
A lot of mixed answers, I have no idea which one to typically do.
I think you should still max q your e would be useless in a 1v1 if there are no minions to use to juke around so just max q.

Time to add a strawpoll.
http://strawpoll.me/3921111

max W. then E.

but seriously, last hit with E and max E...supa easy game.
Dunno about maxing but you should always start E in my opinion. One of my mates mains him and almost always gets first blood at lvl 1 because you can play much more aggressively.
max E first ur Q cd reduce by AS not scaling i believe and also by maxing E u can do more dashes
q, cuz crits and attack damage

It depends if its someone like xerath or syndra with poke you need to avoid you max e or someone like azir who is easy enough to dodge with lv 1 e where you would most likely max q for your eq combo and easier farming because you don't need to dodge him as much

Pretty sure his still Max Q since his E stacks got removed from 100% to 50% (4.11)

Honestly the on-target Cooldown on E isn't that important Super early in the game, but it varies on playstyle.

If your using your E a lot on enemy's then max it, if you use your Q more then max Q being a resourceless champ with Static non-scaling (.1 of a second is meh and on target CD isn't that needed) Cooldowns, you go with what your gonna use more in any given game.
I do E personally
I used to do Q before the changes
